name: YGO! Card View
description:
"YGO! Card View" is the best App for searching and viewing all Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG cards' (more than 8.000) pictures, statistics and effects.

FEATURES
➤ Complete list of all the more than 8000 cards existing in the TCG;
➤ Updated with the latest booster packs and releases such as "Generation Force", "Dawn of the Xyz", "Lost Sanctuary" and "Extreme Victory";
➤ Easy-to-use search for finding the exact card or archetype you are looking for;
➤ Offline statistics and effects' database of all cards;
➤ Thumbnail and full-screen view of all cards !!!
➤ Recommended upgrade to iOS 4;
➤ An advanced search and card filter will be featured in the next update!

NOTE
- "Yu-Gi-Oh!" is registered trademark of Kazuki Takahashi.
- An internet connection is required in order to view cards' pictures from yugioh.wikia.com.

SUPPORT
For critics, supports and improvements please contact me to:
